title: Black Eyed Peas Interview and More
itunes:title: Black Eyed Peas Interview and More
description:
Tuesday 10/10- Today on the show we had music group Black Eyed Peas come by, where they spoke about being signed with late rapper Eazy- E, their new comic book and more. Also, after all the controversy over sports journalist Jemele Hill getting suspended from ESPN, we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners had to say. Moreover, Charlamagne was not pleased with ESPN's President John Skipper and Chairman and Chief executive of Disney, Bob Iger because they were responsible for Jemele Hill's suspension, which resulted to them getting "Donkey of the Day".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 10/10- Today on the show we had music group Black Eyed Peas come by, where they spoke about being signed with late rapper Eazy- E, their new comic book and more. Also, after all the controversy over sports journalist Jemele Hill getting suspended from ESPN, we opened up the phone lines to hear what our listeners had to say. Moreover, Charlamagne was not pleased with ESPN's President John Skipper and Chairman and Chief executive of Disney, Bob Iger because they were responsible for Jemele Hill's suspension, which resulted to them getting "Donkey of the Day".
